name: Metrics
0:
”Alexa, open Product Metrics.”
”Alexa, ask Product Metrics, how many users does Instagram have?”
”Alexa, ask Product Metrics, when was Snapchat first released?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: product metrics
Developer Terms of Use
des: As a product manager in tech, it's important to stay on top of the latest trends in virtual communities. Users can now ask Alexa how many active users Instagram or Snapchat has, who the parent company of a product is, or the country of origin of a certain product.
